name: The Matrix Refactored
description:
The Matrix Refactored is an extremely realistic VR simulation of what it is like to be Neo and live in The Matrix.

This project aims be just like The Matrix but with an emphasis on standardized patterns and a more legible re-usable code base.

The Matrix Refactored cuts out all of the fluff of the original Matrix and boils it down to the very core elements we all know and love.

Believe it or not, this entire simulation was made in under 48 hours of intense cyber hacking. Just like Neo.
